ygData.subject: RE: New NPC in Highpass? (off-topic & possible spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I met him when the patch for mail was out.  I was there trying to do the mail thing then I saw him.  U are lucky you did not have to fight his pet too.  When I
ygData.messageBody:
I met him when the patch for mail was out. I was there trying to do the
mail thing then I saw him. U are lucky you did not have to fight his pet
too. When I saw him he just came right after me so I just zone. When I
came back after 5 minutes he was gone and noone has seen him. I thought it
was verant way of telling us that there are a lot of unique NPC out there
with great loot. Very disappointed to hear there was no loot.

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Syren Wind
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
